term.title: helix sense

item.text: The right-handed sense of a helix traces out a clockwise rotation moving away from the observer; the left-handed sense of a helix traces out a counterclockwise rotation moving away from the observer, e.g. the ...TG +TG +TG + ... helix of isotactic poly(propylene) is left-handed.
